response.overview: Shigeo "Mob" Kageyama, a socially awkward, emotionally repressed middle schooler with immense psychic powers. To avoid causing harm, he keeps his emotions under control, but when his mental gauge hits 100%, he unleashes chaotic, uncontrollable abilities. Produced by Studio Bones, the series balances high-stakes supernatural action with a heartwarming, character-driven story about personal growth, emotional maturity, and the true meaning of strength.
response.title: Mob Psycho 100: The Final Light
